data.text: @wehjuun_ Hi, fray ♡!  Bern here. You may check on our existing promotional fares in our website https://t.co/wngAzjsqbM. See you on-board!

@goluptiousgem_ Hi creativepanda. As per checking, 5J951 MNLDVO this coming 11Nov will be cancelled. We apologize for this inconvenience.  To view your options, please refer to this link: https://t.co/k9grG8H83W. Stay safe.

@CkXian05 Hi Denver! Quoted one-way base fares are inclusive of 7kg hand carry baggage allowance, but exclusive of Web Admin Fee, 12% VAT, Terminal Fees and Fuel Surcharge. You have the option to select/add if you want to have Ceb Prepaid baggage with a fee. Hope to see you on board soon!

@pvc_parfait We will help you look into it ketten. For assistance and the security of your personal information, you may send the details of your concern thru: https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Stay safe.

data.text: @goluptiousgem_ Hi creativepanda! Bern here. Be at the airport at least two (2) hours (for domestic) and three (3) hours (for international) before your flight’s scheduled time of departure for a more relaxed experience, as you go through the new pre-departure procedures. See you on board!

@OrangeDorico Hi Orange. We will be glad to look into it. To further assist you and the security of your personal information, please send us a  message  via Charlie the chatbot  thru: https://t.co/zvAz6wmmkV . Or, send us a private message via: https://t.co/gNaqWV5Qww. Thanks!

data.text: @engageurself Hi Patrick! Tel here. Sorry for this. May I ask what error did you encounter? Thank you!

@jobmarc Hi Marc! Tel here. We are sorry for what happened. I will be glad to look into it. Can I have your case number so I could reach out to the case owner? Please monitor the email used in filing this case. Thanks for your patience!

@engageurself We are sorry to hear about this, Patrick. Please be advised that for voluntary rebooking, change fee and fare difference will apply. Kindly manage your booking up to 2 hours before the departure time through https://t.co/k9grG8YJsw. Thank you.
@vangeodee For more information, guests may also visit https://t.co/u6oKwUR1K6. Thank you.

@vangeodee Hi vangeodee. Please be advised that quoted one-way base fares are inclusive of 7 kg hand carry baggage allowance, but exclusive of Web Admin Fee, 12% VAT, Terminal Fees and Fuel Surcharge. You can also check the fare breakdown of the ticket prior payment page.

@vangeodee Hi Vangeo. Discount will not apply if ticket availed is under promo fare. However 12% discount will automatically deducted as long as Senior Citizen (CD) / PWD is declared upon booking. Thank you.
@piinytoin Hi Pia. How may we help you?

@khezeyzey_ We sincerely apologize for this inconvenience 
ceomindset.eth. We may change our schedules and/or cancel or delay any flight where we reasonably consider this to be justified by circumstances beyond our control or for reasons of safety and security.

data.text: @SugarNSpiceee_ Hi Sugar&Spice. Liquor are only accepted as checked baggage and not in your hand-carry bag. Please note that alcoholic drinks are limited to maximum of 5 liters, as these are considered dangerous goods due to its flammable nature. Ensure any liquids are properly packed & sealed.

data.text: @JojoTismo Hi Joselito! Yes we do. You may check and search for the lowest fare for your preferred flight and schedule thru our website at https://t.co/kPgrcWAGam . Hope to see you on board soon!

@LohnDio Hi Nahor. Valid ID we accept are ID cards which reflects on its face the name, picture, date of birth, & nationality of the guest checking-in. Valid ID includes Company or School ID, passport, or government-issued ID. SSS, GSIS, Driver’s License, UMID, PRC ID, PWD ID or OSCA.

data.text: @lnah__ Thank you for raising the concern and our apologies also for the inconvenience, @lnah__. To assist you further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

data.text: @_03oya You may also bring a small bag as said item is considered as exception and shall be allowed on top of the one (1) piece carry-on baggage. Carry-on/hand carry baggage allowance including any exception, should be a maximum of 2pcs only and with total combined weight of 7kg or less.
@_03oya Hi pabili- wtb. Every passenger is allowed one (1) carry-on baggage inside the cabin, with a maximum weight of seven (7) kilograms and dimension of up to 56cm x 36cm x 23cm.
